sentences: Gene Pokorny (born May 15, 1953) is an American tubist.
He has played with the Chicago Symphony Orchestra since his appointment by Georg Solti in 1988.
Pokorny has performed on several movie soundtracks including Jurassic Park, The Fugitive, and The Nightmare Before Christmas and has recorded three solo albums.
In June 2000, he premiered John D. Stevens’ piece Journey – Concerto for Contrabass Tuba and Orchestra with the Chicago Symphony.

Pokorny has participated in numerous educational workshops, classes, and presentations, including McGill University's Brass Year program in 2009 and the annual Pokorny Brass Seminar at the University of Redlands, where he studied.
